In space, no-one can hear you scream. On Mars, they could hear you, but it would take longer, sound quieter than on Earth and come with strange delays, recordings from the red planet have shown.

articles.title: T rex's tiny arms may have been a life-saver - The Times
articles.description: Tyrannosaurus rex had such tiny forearms because it kept them out of the way of snapping jaws during pack feeding frenzies, a palaeontologist has suggested.
articles.content:

articles.title: 'Strawberry squid' is spotted in the 'twilight zone' off the coast of California - Daily Mail
articles.description: Marine scientists filmed the strawberry squid 2,378 feet deep in Monterey Canyon, a submarine canyon in Monterey Bay, Moss Landing, California.
articles.content:
